name: claude-code-lsp
description: Universal Language Server Protocol client for Claude Code - supports 25+ programming languages with automatic server management
author: Steven Chong

scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --outfile bin/claude-lsp-cli
scripts.build:server: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/server.ts --compile --outfile bin/claude-lsp-server
scripts.build:hook: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/hook.ts --compile --outfile bin/claude-lsp-hook
scripts.build:diagnostics: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/diagnostics.ts --compile --outfile bin/claude-lsp-diagnostics
scripts.build: mkdir -p bin && bun run build:cli && bun run build:server && bun run build:hook && bun run build:diagnostics
